column1: james ""jim"" d. mack| james ""jim"" d. mack (may 7
column3: 2015) send sympathy card graveside service for james d. ""jim"" mack
column7: 2015 in the memorial park cemetery mausoleum. in lieu of flowers
column8: jim's family has asked that memorial donations be given to the american cancer society or the charity of one's choosing with henninger-hinson funeral home acting as custodians of the funds. print back
